input_text.Prompt:
Using the item specifications and item title, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item title:
Grizzly C2125 Shaper Cutter with Double Lock Miter and 3/4-Inch Bore

Item specifications:
Grizzly 3/4-Inch bore shaper cutters feature top-quality c-2 carbide--the best available for wood cutting applications shaped and sharpened with dam
Double Lock Miter
Cutting length: 1-Inch
Can be used on wood, composites, plywood, and some plastics at 5,000 to 10,000 rpm

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
Attention: Introducing the Grizzly C2125 Shaper Cutter with Double Lock Miter and 3/4-Inch Bore, the ultimate tool for precision woodworking and cutting applications.

Interest: Crafted with top-quality C-2 carbide, this shaper cutter boasts exceptional durability and cutting performance, ensuring a flawless finish on various wood species, composites, plywood, and some plastics. The Double Lock Miter design guarantees a secure hold on the material, while the 3/4-Inch bore enables seamless integration with your preferred shaper.

Desire: Imagine the thrill of effortlessly shaping and cutting diverse materials with unparalleled accuracy and precision. With the Grizzly C2125 Shaper Cutter, you can bring your creative visions to life, whether you're a skilled woodworker or a beginner looking to elevate your craft.

Action: Upgrade your woodworking game with this premium shaper cutter, designed to perform at speeds of 5,000 to 10,000 rpm. Purchase the Grizzly C2125 Shaper Cutter today and unlock your full creative potential in the world of woodworking.
input_text.Response B:
Get the best possible performance out of your shaper with Grizzly 3/4-Inch bore shaper cutters. These top-quality c-2 carbide shaper cutters are shaped and sharpened with diamond, providing you with long-lasting cutting performance. The c-2 grade carbide is the best available for wood cutting applications, providing you with superior cutting speed and durability. The top-quality double lock miter prevents the cutter from slipping during use. This set of shaper cutters is perfect for a wide range of materials, including wood, composites, plywood, and some plastics, at speeds of up to 10,000 rpm. 

Cutting length: 1-Inch
Bore size: 3/4-Inch
Number of pieces: 1

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
